code: import toArray from"rc-util/es/Children/toArray";import Sider from'../Sider';export default function useHasSider(siders,children,hasSider){if(typeof hasSider==='boolean'){return hasSider;}if(siders.length){return true;}const childNodes=toArray(children);return childNodes.some(node=>node.type===Sider);}
